message:
At the 7th Centenary Celebrations of Jagadguru Madhvacharya, recalled the noble ideals of Jagadguru Madhvacharya. 

We are proud that we belong to a land that is home to several Saints, who devoted their life towards service & social reform. From removing poverty & inequality to climate change, the path shown by our Saints & Seers have the power to make our world a better place. http://nm-4.com/za6z
